players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso I investigated last night. He's been quiet, which makes me suspicious."
Charlie: "I am the mafioso, and I killed Alice last night. Bob's suspicion is misplaced; I was busy disposing of her body."
You: "I don't believe Charlie. He's trying to deflect suspicion from himself by claiming he was busy disposing of Alice's body."
